House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07887
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING THE PHILIPPINE CANCER CENTER, PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Seeks to create and establish a specialized cancer center known as “Philippine Cancer Center” that shall promote and engage in scientific research for the prevention of cancer and the care and/or treatment of cancer patients; facilitate and encourage the exchange of ideas and information on the prevention, treatment and control of cancer; and develop public interest on cancer awareness and general health.
ALIAS NAME : “Philippine Cancer Center Act of 2018.”

DATE FILED : 2018-06-27
